verses.verse: עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> 'al- on מִשְׁכָּבִי֙ <S%H4904><s%> mish-ka-Vi on my bed בַּלֵּיל֔וֹת <S%H3915><s%> bal-lei-Lot, By night בִּקַּ֕שְׁתִּי <S%H1245><s%> bik-Kash-ti I sought אֵ֥ת <S%H853><s%> 'et שֶׁאָהֲבָ֖ה <S%H157><s%> she-'a-ha-Vah loveth נַפְשִׁ֑י <S%H5315><s%> naf-Shi; him whom my soul בִּקַּשְׁתִּ֖יו <S%H1245><s%> bik-kash-Tiv I sought וְלֹ֥א <S%H3808><s%> ve-Lo did not מְצָאתִֽיו׃ <S%H4672><s%> me-tza-Tiv. him but I found

אָק֨וּמָה <S%H6965><s%> 'a-Ku-mah I will rise נָּ֜א <S%H4994><s%> na now וַאֲסוֹבְבָ֣ה <S%H5437><s%> va-'a-sov-Vah now and go about בָעִ֗יר <S%H5892><s%> va-'Ir, the city בַּשְּׁוָקִים֙ <S%H7784><s%> bash-she-va-Kim in the streets וּבָ֣רְחֹב֔וֹת <S%H7339><s%> u-Va-re-cho-Vot, and in the broad ways אֲבַקְשָׁ֕ה <S%H1245><s%> 'a-vak-Shah I will seek אֵ֥ת <S%H853><s%> 'et שֶׁאָהֲבָ֖ה <S%H157><s%> she-'a-ha-Vah loveth נַפְשִׁ֑י <S%H5315><s%> naf-Shi; him whom my soul בִּקַּשְׁתִּ֖יו <S%H1245><s%> bik-kash-Tiv I sought וְלֹ֥א <S%H3808><s%> ve-Lo did not מְצָאתִֽיו׃ <S%H4672><s%> me-tza-Tiv. him but I found

מְצָא֙וּנִי֙ <S%H4672><s%> me-tza-'U-ni found הַשֹּׁ֣מְרִ֔ים <S%H8104><s%> hash-Sho-me-Rim, The watchmen הַסֹּבְבִ֖ים <S%H5437><s%> has-soe-Vim that go about בָּעִ֑יר <S%H5892><s%> ba-'Ir; the city אֵ֛ת <S%H853><s%> 'et שֶׁאָהֲבָ֥ה <S%H157><s%> she-'a-ha-Vah loveth נַפְשִׁ֖י <S%H5315><s%> naf-Shi ye him whom my soul רְאִיתֶֽם׃ <S%H7200><s%> re-'i-Tem. me [to whom I said] Saw

כִּמְעַט֙ <S%H4592><s%> kim-'At [It was] but a little שֶׁעָבַ֣רְתִּי <S%H5674><s%> she-'a-Var-ti that I passed מֵהֶ֔ם <S%H1992><s%> me-Hem, like עַ֣ד <S%H5704><s%> 'ad Until שֶֽׁמָּצָ֔אתִי <S%H4672><s%> shem-ma-Tza-ti, from them but I found אֵ֥ת <S%H853><s%> 'et שֶׁאָהֲבָ֖ה <S%H157><s%> she-'a-ha-Vah loveth נַפְשִׁ֑י <S%H5315><s%> naf-Shi; him whom my soul אֲחַזְתִּיו֙ <S%H270><s%> 'a-chaz-Tiv I held וְלֹ֣א <S%H3808><s%> ve-Lo not אַרְפֶּ֔נּוּ <S%H7503><s%> 'ar-Pen-nu, him and would not let him go עַד־ <S%H5704><s%> 'ad- Until שֶׁ֤הֲבֵיאתִיו֙ <S%H935><s%> she-ha-vei-tiv until I had brought אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> 'el- about בֵּ֣ית <S%H1004><s%> beit house אִמִּ֔י <S%H517><s%> 'im-Mi, him into my mother's וְאֶל־ <S%H413><s%> ve-'el- and חֶ֖דֶר <S%H2315><s%> Che-der and into the chamber הוֹרָתִֽי׃ <S%H2029><s%> ho-ra-Ti. of her that conceived

הִשְׁבַּ֨עְתִּי <S%H7650><s%> hish-Ba'-ti I charge אֶתְכֶ֜ם <S%H853><s%> 'et-Chem בְּנ֤וֹת <S%H1323><s%> be-Not you O ye daughters יְרוּשָׁלִַ֙ם֙ <S%H3389><s%> ye-ru-sha-Lim of Jerusalem בִּצְבָא֔וֹת <S%H6643><s%> bitz-va-'ot, by the roes א֖וֹ <S%H176><s%> o and בְּאַיְל֣וֹת <S%H355><s%> be-'ay-Lot by the hinds הַשָּׂדֶ֑ה <S%H7704><s%> has-sa-Deh; of the field אִם־ <S%H518><s%> 'im- you will not תָּעִ֧ירוּ׀ <S%H5782><s%> ta-'I-ru that ye stir not up וְֽאִם־ <S%H518><s%> ve-'im- or תְּעֽוֹרְר֛וּ <S%H5782><s%> te-'or-Ru nor awake אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- הָאַהֲבָ֖ה <S%H160><s%> ha-'a-ha-Vah [my] love עַ֥ד <S%H5704><s%> 'ad Until שֶׁתֶּחְפָּֽץ׃ <S%H2654><s%> shet-tech-Patz. till he please ס sa-Mek

מִ֣י <S%H4310><s%> mi What זֹ֗את <S%H2063><s%> Zot, likewise עֹלָה֙ <S%H5927><s%> 'o-Lah Who [is] this that cometh מִן־ <S%H4480><s%> min- from הַמִּדְבָּ֔ר <S%H4057><s%> ham-mid-Bar, out of the wilderness כְּתִֽימֲר֖וֹת <S%H8490><s%> ke-ti-ma-Rot like pillars עָשָׁ֑ן <S%H6227><s%> 'a-Shan; of smoke מְקֻטֶּ֤רֶת <S%H6999><s%> me-kut-Te-ret perfumed מוֹר֙ <S%H4753><s%> mOr with myrrh וּלְבוֹנָ֔ה <S%H3828><s%> u-le-vo-Nah, and frankincense מִכֹּ֖ל <S%H3605><s%> mik-Kol all אַבְקַ֥ת <S%H81><s%> 'av-Kat with all powders רוֹכֵֽל׃ <S%H7402><s%> ro-Chel. of the merchant

הִנֵּ֗ה <S%H2009><s%> hin-Neh, Behold מִטָּתוֹ֙ <S%H4296><s%> mit-ta-To Behold his bed שֶׁלִּשְׁלֹמֹ֔ה <S%H8010><s%> shel-lish-lo-Moh, which [is] Solomon's שִׁשִּׁ֥ים <S%H8346><s%> shish-Shim threescore גִּבֹּרִ֖ים <S%H1368><s%> gib-bo-Rim valiant סָבִ֣יב <S%H5439><s%> sa-Viv men [are] about לָ֑הּ Lah; מִגִּבֹּרֵ֖י <S%H1368><s%> mig-gib-bo-Rei it of the valiant יִשְׂרָאֵֽל׃ <S%H3478><s%> Yis-ra-'El. of Israel

כֻּלָּם֙ <S%H3605><s%> kul-Lam All אֲחֻ֣זֵי <S%H270><s%> 'a-Chu-zei They all hold חֶ֔רֶב <S%H2719><s%> Che-rev, swords מְלֻמְּדֵ֖י <S%H3925><s%> me-lum-me-Dei [being] expert מִלְחָמָ֑ה <S%H4421><s%> mil-cha-Mah; in war אִ֤ישׁ <S%H376><s%> 'ish every man חַרְבּוֹ֙ <S%H2719><s%> char-Bo [hath] his sword עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> 'al- at יְרֵכ֔וֹ <S%H3409><s%> ye-re-Cho, upon his thigh מִפַּ֖חַד <S%H6343><s%> mip-Pa-chad because of fear בַּלֵּילֽוֹת׃ <S%H3915><s%> bal-lei-Lot. in the night ס sa-Mek

אַפִּרְי֗וֹן <S%H668><s%> ap-pir-Yon, himself a chariot עָ֤שָׂה <S%H6213><s%> 'A-sah made לוֹ֙ lo הַמֶּ֣לֶךְ <S%H4428><s%> ham-Me-lech King שְׁלֹמֹ֔ה <S%H8010><s%> she-lo-Moh, Solomon מֵעֲצֵ֖י <S%H6086><s%> me-'a-Tzei of the wood הַלְּבָנֽוֹן׃ <S%H3844><s%> hal-le-va-Non. of Lebanon

עַמּוּדָיו֙ <S%H5982><s%> 'am-mu-Dav the pillars עָ֣שָׂה <S%H6213><s%> 'A-sah He made כֶ֔סֶף <S%H3701><s%> Che-sef, thereof [of] silver רְפִידָת֣וֹ <S%H7507><s%> re-fi-da-To the bottom זָהָ֔ב <S%H2091><s%> za-Hav, thereof [of] gold מֶרְכָּב֖וֹ <S%H4817><s%> mer-ka-Vo the covering אַרְגָּמָ֑ן <S%H713><s%> 'ar-ga-Man; of it [of] purple תּוֹכוֹ֙ <S%H8432><s%> to-Cho the midst רָצ֣וּף <S%H7528><s%> ra-Tzuf thereof being paved אַהֲבָ֔ה <S%H160><s%> 'a-ha-Vah, [with] love מִבְּנ֖וֹת <S%H1323><s%> mib-be-Not for the daughters יְרוּשָׁלִָֽם׃ <S%H3389><s%> ye-ru-sha-Lim. of Jerusalem

צְאֶ֧ינָה׀ <S%H3318><s%> tze-'Ei-nah Go forth וּֽרְאֶ֛ינָה <S%H7200><s%> u-re-'Ei-nah and behold בְּנ֥וֹת <S%H1323><s%> be-Not O ye daughters צִיּ֖וֹן <S%H6726><s%> tzi-Yon of Zion בַּמֶּ֣לֶךְ <S%H4428><s%> bam-Me-lech king שְׁלֹמֹ֑ה <S%H8010><s%> she-lo-Moh; Solomon בָּעֲטָרָ֗ה <S%H5850><s%> ba-'a-ta-Rah, with the crown שֶׁעִטְּרָה־ <S%H5849><s%> she-'it-te-rah- crowned לּ֤וֹ lo אִמּוֹ֙ <S%H517><s%> im-Mo wherewith his mother בְּי֣וֹם <S%H3117><s%> be-Yom him in the day חֲתֻנָּת֔וֹ <S%H2861><s%> cha-tun-na-To, of his espousals וּבְי֖וֹם <S%H3117><s%> u-ve-Yom and in the day שִׂמְחַ֥ת <S%H8057><s%> sim-Chat of the gladness לִבּֽוֹ׃ <S%H3820><s%> lib-Bo. of his heart ס sa-Mek
